sub-formations.description: Four in the back line, four midfielders flat, two strikers.
sub-formations.notes: Classic balanced formation. Solid defensively and offensively with clear width. Ideal for wing play with crosses to two forwards.

sub-formations.description: Four defenders, a midfield diamond (CDM at base, two wide mids, CAM at tip), and a double striker.
sub-formations.notes: Focuses control on central areas, effective for quick, intricate passes and overloads. Vulnerable wide due to narrow midfield.

sub-formations.description: Four defenders, three midfielders (Three at base, one at tip,), and a double striker.
sub-formations.notes: Concentrates play through the center. Good for possession-based play but risks being outflanked on sides.

sub-formations.description: Four defenders, Four midfielders (Two at base, Two wide), and a double striker.
sub-formations.notes: Offers good balance between defense and attack. Wide midfielders support wingers, creating width and crossing opportunities.

sub-formations.description: Four defenders, four midfielders (straight line), and two strikers one behind the other vertical positioned.
sub-formations.notes: Provides a link-up forward behind the striker, useful for creative playmaking and holding up the ball.

sub-formations.description: Four defenders, four midfielders (One at base, three in attack, just opposite or inverted triangle as in 4-3-1-2), and a double striker.
sub-formations.notes: Supports quick transitions and attacking pressure with midfield runners while retaining defensive cover.

sub-formations.description: Four in the back line, five midfielders flat, one lone striker.
sub-formations.notes: Defensively robust. Controls midfield and slows opponent attacks. Striker relies heavily on support from midfield.

sub-formations.description: Four defenders in the back line, five midfielders (one at base, makes a inverted equilateral triangle in the mid with left right extra mid to extend wings resulting in four in flat line attack positioned wide spaced), and a single striker.
sub-formations.notes: Emphasizes midfield dominance and wing play for supply, protects defense with a deep holding midfielder.

sub-formations.description: Four defenders in the back line, five midfielders (two at base equidistant, three in flat line attack positioned closed spaced optional middle one as CAM), and a single striker.
sub-formations.notes: Balanced formation that supports both attack and defense. CAM plays a key creative role feeding the striker.

sub-formations.description: Four defenders in the back line, five midfielders (three at base equidistant, two in flat line attack positioned narrower than the middlefielder behind them), and a single striker.
sub-formations.notes: Offers strong defensive shape with precise attacking. Pyramid structure enables control and quick passing combinations.

sub-formations.description: Four in the back line, three midfielders flat, three strikers.
sub-formations.notes: Widely used attacking formation. Emphasizes wing play and high pressing with 3 forwards and 3 central mids.

sub-formations.description: Four defenders, three midfielders (Two at top, one at tip), and three strikers.
sub-formations.notes: Midfielders push higher for direct support; great for strong attacking formation with good balance.

sub-formations.description: Four defenders, two midfielders (Two at base, one at tip), and three strikers.
sub-formations.notes: Solid in defense and attack. Focused on controlling the midfield base while providing attacking guidance from CAM.

sub-formations.description: Five in the back line, three midfielders flat, two strikers.
sub-formations.notes: Highly defensive, protects aggressively against wide attacks but can be vulnerable to quick central counters.

sub-formations.description: Five defenders, three midfielders triangle equal space two at base one at tip, two strikers.
sub-formations.notes: Midfield triangle supports central play and quick transitions to the two strikers.

sub-formations.description: Five defenders, two midfielders (Two at midfield, wide), and three strikers.
sub-formations.notes: Offers strong rear defense with attacking options; midfielders tasked with covering a lot ground.

sub-formations.description: Five defenders, two midfielders (Two at midfield, wide), triple strikers (one at tip, two lowered on wings closer to midfield).
sub-formations.notes: Tries to maximize attacking threat with three forwards, relying heavily on midfield support.

sub-formations.description: Five in the back line, four midfielders flat, one lone striker.
sub-formations.notes: Defensively focused and solid, relies on lone strikerâ€™s work rate and team support.

sub-formations.description: Five defenders, a midfield diamond (CDM at base, two wide mids, CAM at tip), and a single striker.
sub-formations.notes: Midfield diamond allows both attack support and defensive solidity, giving lone striker ample supply.

sub-formations.description: Three defenders, five midfielders flat line, and two strikers.
sub-formations.notes: Flexible formation offering midfield dominance and two striker threat but needs defensively strong back 3.

sub-formations.description: Three defenders, Five Midilfielders (two at base preferred CM or CDM or DM, + one at tip making triangle this is CAM positioned attack) two spread positioned in wings of mid, two strikers.
sub-formations.notes: Provides good balance between midfield solidity and attacking width with two strikers upfront.

sub-formations.description: Three defenders, Five Midilfielders (one at base preferred DM or CDM, two at tip making a inverted triangle these are CAM positioned attack) two spread positioned in wings of mid, two strikers.
sub-formations.notes: Attacking formation that looks to overwhelm opponents with midfield numbers and two striker presence.

sub-formations.description: Three defenders, Four Midilfielders, one at base preferred DM or CDM, two at tip making a inverted triangle these are CAM positioned attack) two spread positioned in wings of mid, two strikers.
sub-formations.notes: Compact formation focusing on central play and strong attacking midfield support for strikers.

sub-formations.description: Three defenders, Five Midilfielders flat lined, two strikers one behind the other vertical positioned.
sub-formations.notes: Provides midfield control and mixes two striker roles with vertical striker support up front.

sub-formations.description: Three defenders, four midfielders flat line, and three strikers.
sub-formations.notes: Highly offensive formation that pushes wide players forward for maximum pressure.

sub-formations.description: Three defenders, four midfielders flat line, and three strikers one at tip and wingers lowered.
sub-formations.notes: Encourages compact midfield with advanced striker support; wingers drop to create passing lanes.

sub-formations.description: Three defenders, four midfielders diamond, and three strikers flat line.
sub-formations.notes: Midfield diamond improves central control and supports fluid attack with three forwards.

sub-formations.description: Three defenders, Four midfielders Three at base flat line one at tip optional CAM, and three strikers.
sub-formations.notes: Compact setup focusing on midfield density and multiple attacking options.
